CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When considering that PIDT-C12NT shows higher hole mobility and superior absorption to that of PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT , it is rational to envisage that PIDT-C12NT would achieve superior processability and backbone planarity among three polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. PIDT-C12NT
2. PIDT - EHNT
3. PIDT - DTNT

These are the Material Names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PIDT-C12NT
2. PIDT - EHNT
3. PIDT - DTNT

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Names. All other entities in the paragraph are not relevant to the identification of Material Names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT-C12NT |
| PIDT - EHNT |
| PIDT - DTNT |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When considering that PIDT-C12NT shows higher hole mobility and superior absorption to that of PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT , it is rational to envisage that PIDT-C12NT would achieve superior processability and backbone planarity among three polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. PIDT-C12NT: This is a specific type of polymer with the property of higher hole mobility.
2. PIDT - EHNT: This is another type of polymer with a property of lower hole mobility compared to PIDT-C12NT.
3. PIDT - DTNT: This is yet another type of polymer with a property of lower hole mobility compared to PIDT-C12NT.
4. Superior processability: This is a desirable property that PIDT-C12NT may possess due to its higher hole mobility and superior absorption.
5. Backbone planarity: This is another desirable property that PIDT-C12NT may possess due to its superior absorption and higher hole mobility.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PIDT-C12NT: This polymer has higher hole mobility.
2. PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT: These polymers have lower hole mobility compared to PIDT-C12NT.
3. Superior processability: This is a potential material property of PIDT-C12NT.
4. Backbone planarity: This is a potential material property of PIDT-C12NT.
5. Higher hole mobility: This is a material property of PIDT-C12NT that is superior to that of PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT.
6. Superior absorption: This is a material property of PIDT-C12NT that is superior to that of PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PIDT-C12NT: higher hole mobility |
| PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT: lower hole mobility |
| Superior processability (potential property of PIDT-C12NT) |
| Backbone planarity (potential property of PIDT-C12NT) |
